ShortcodeParser().name: ShortcodeParser
ShortcodeParser().description: Create a new Shortcode parser instance.

ShortcodeParser.add.name: add
ShortcodeParser.add.description: Add a new handler to the parser for given tag name.

params.description: Tag name to set handler for.
params.name: name

params.description: Handler function to fire on tag.
params.name: handler

params.description: Throw error if tage already exists?
params.name: throwOnAlreadySet

ShortcodeParser.has.name: has
ShortcodeParser.has.description: Test if a handler for given tag name.

params.description: The tag to look for a handler on.
params.name: name

ShortcodeParser.delete.name: delete
ShortcodeParser.delete.description: Delete the handler for given tag name.

params.description: The tagname to delete the handler for.
params.name: name

ShortcodeParser.get.name: get
ShortcodeParser.get.description: Get the handler function for given tag name.

params.description: Tag name to get the handler for.
params.name: name

returns.description: The handler for the given tag name.
